      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String input_password)
        A method to check if the user enter correct identification
        参数:
        username - username which the client input
        input_password - password which the client input
        返回:
        boolean type to recognize if it is correct

      • checkName

        public boolean checkName(java.lang.String username)
        check whether username is exist
        参数:
        username - username
        返回:
        boolean type to recognize whether it is exist

      • getByName

        public User getByName(java.lang.String name)

        参数:

        返回:
        user object

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String occupation,
                   java.lang.String birthday,
                   int gender,
                   int id)
        Update information.
        参数:
        name - nickname
        occupation - occupation of user
        birthday - user's birthday
        gender - user's gender
        id - user's id
